venue.address_2: (Teele Square; just steps from Davis Square)
venue.name: PJ Ryans

item.description: Hi guys, First game of the Rugby World Cup campaign is being played this coming Saturday night local time. If there are enough people interested in watching the game we will set up an event. Most likely it would be one of the Irish pubs in the city or at someone's house.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: RWC 2011: Wallabies vs Italy
